items.text:
As you dance along in time to the music, you feel the ground suddenly
shake beneath your feet. The musicians stop and the dancers pause.

Suddenly, the center of the green collapses downward. People run
screaming from the pit, and you see feelers and then giant, snapping
mandibles rise up into the air. The segmented, sinuous form of Ol’
Bloody Clicker erupts from the earth, and all of the villagers flee.
